mapper.insert: insert into tb_process (id, type, name, priority, state, stage, stagestate, progress, userid, username, createtime, time ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stagestate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{progress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},

userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tb_process set type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, priority = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stage = #{stage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stagestate = #{stagestate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, progress = #{progress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select m.rowNum from (select p.id,(@i :=@i + 1) AS rowNum from tb_process p,(SELECT @i := 0) AS it where p.state != 3 order by priority desc, id) as m where m.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
